assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The institutional review board (IRB) of CHU de Montpellier approved the experimental protocol (2018_IRB-MTP_05-05 obtained on the 15th June 2018). The zebrafish study was conducted in accordance with the recommendations of INSERM, Montpellier University and the European Convention for the Protection of Animals used for Experimental and Scientific Purposes.
